scripts.db:migrate: dotenv -e .env -- npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config src/config/sequelizeconfig.js --migrations-path src/migrations
scripts.db:migrate:undo: dotenv -e .env -- npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo --config src/config/sequelizeconfig.js --migrations-path src/migrations
scripts.db:seed: dotenv -e .env -- npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --config src/config/sequelizeconfig.js --seeders-path src/seeders
scripts.db:seed:undo: dotenv -e .env -- npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all --config src/config/sequelizeconfig.js --seeders-path src/seeders
